CupsService.description: The CupsService schema describes the root of the Cups Service. All other CUPS resources are linked directly or indirectly to the CUPS Service.
CupsService.longDescription: The CupsService schema describes the root of the Cups Service. All other CUPS resources are linked directly or indirectly to the CUPS Service.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AveragingPeriod.description: Averaging period over which CUPS Service shall average redings.
AveragingPeriod.longDescription: This property shall contain averaging period over which CUPS Service shall average redings.

CupsSensors.description: The link to the collection of CUPS sensors.
CupsSensors.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to the collection of CUPS sensors.

DynamicLoadFactors.longDescription: This property shall contain the dynamic load factors.

Interval.longDescription: This property shall contain interval between CUPS readings.

LoadFactorConfiguration.description: Describes which load factors should be used for CUPS Index calculations.
LoadFactorConfiguration.longDescription: This property shall contain description of which load factors should be used for CUPS Index calculations.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

StaticLoadFactors.longDescription: This property shall contain the dynamic load factors.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

LoadFactorConfiguration.description: Selects which load factors shall be used by CUPS Service.

enumDescriptions.Dynamic: CUPS service shall use load factors calculated in runtime.
enumDescriptions.Static: CUPS service shall use load factors provided by the user.

LoadFactorConfiguration.longDescription: This property shall determine whether the CUPS Service shall use dynamic (calculated in runtime) or static (provided by the user e.g. datacenter administrator) load factors.

LoadFactors.longDescription: This type shall contain values of load factors used by the CUPS Service.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CoreLoadFactor.description: Load factor for Core compute domain.
CoreLoadFactor.longDescription: This property shall contain load factor for Core compute domain.

IioLoadFactor.description: Load factor for IIO compute domain.
IioLoadFactor.longDescription: This property shall contain load factor for IIO compute domain.

MemoryLoadFactor.description: Load factor for Memory compute domain.
MemoryLoadFactor.longDescription: This property shall contain load factor for Memory compute domain.

title: #CupsService.v1_0_0.CupsService
